about_the_game:
In Three Wishes, players make choices to determine what wishes the girls make. Each wish compounds on the previous and leads to crazy outcomes. Individual routes take under 20 minutes to complete and completing the game should take between 3-5 hours.

STORY, CHARACTERS, & GAMEPLAY

Addie, Mint, and Emi are on their way to a sleepover when a shooting star falls from the sky and crashes right near them! Saty appears, promising to grant them whatever their hearts desire. The catch? She will only grant Three Wishes! (hehe)

Get an up close and personal peek into the lives of the eccentric Lilpads and others!

  • Addie is Lily's airheaded but always energetic little sister!

  • Mint is Nym's sadistic and genius level intellect little sister!

  • Emi is Vicky's depressed yet still hopeful little sister!

  • Saty is a mysterious girl who fell from the sky and claims she can grant wishes!

The player assumes a passive role during gameplay, influencing the decisions the girls make when wishing. Guide the girls as they wish for whatever their hearts desire! Each wish will lead to more wild outcomes. Can you help them make the perfect wish? Over 10 endings to experience! Fully original soundtrack by Vect (@VectressWasHere on YouTube)!

HEADPATS ENGINE

Years of engineering, millions of dollars of funding, and recent breakthroughs in quantum technology have allowed our team of top-notch developers (me) to craft something truly special. I proudly present: The Headpats Engine!

Characters are fully dynamic and can be interacted with at pretty much any time during gameplay. Feeling down? headpat. Hungry? Give a headpat. Broken leg? Might I suggest headpats?

Thank you to everyone who made this incredible technology possible.

QUIPS SYSTEM

Do you hate silly pointless lines of dialogue in visual novels? Me neither! So I toiled endlessly pondering how I could stuff even more dialogue on screen so even the dialogue can have dialogue. After extensive testing, I arrived at a technology that will revolutionize visual novels! I call it: The Quips System!

With this unprecedented technology, characters can now be implied to be saying small lines of dialogue (quips, if you will) in reaction to the main lines of dialogue. They can also react to other characters or show off their internal dialogue. It opens up a lot of possibility for new interaction!

I expect this system to fundamentally change the visual novel landscape within the next 5-10 years and couldn't be happier to finally bring it to the public.

WISH NETWORK

I believe this incredible new breakthrough is unlike anything players have gotten From Software like this before and it has the potential to completely change how visual novel fans interact with and play their games. Introducing: The Wish Network!

Using the Wish Network, players will be able to check for messages left by other players in different timelines and craft their own messages. Every single line of dialogue has its own dedicated database with 2 Terabytes of storage, enough hard disk space to be capable of gently holding the words of wise players who have left small bits of wisdom for others to be guided by.

In fact, this technology is so new and groundbreaking that it is still in development, even as we speak, and probably will be right up until release! Only the best for the players, thank you for your support!

OTHER THINGS TO NOTE (POSSIBLE SPOILERS BELOW THIS POINT)

I really tried to push the boundary of what people think a visual novel can be by adding lots of weird and experimental features! I expect some may not mesh so well with the genre, but I couldn't help myself. I hope you enjoy :D

Three Wishes is a visual novel based in the Lily's Day Off world. It's not necessary to have played the other games to play this one, but it'd probably make stuff funnier. Or you might go "Hey I know that character, haha." one or two times if you've played the other games.

The Steam assets illustration was made by Soyacomu (Soyatu).

There are some scenes that some players may find disturbing.

short_description: Have you ever wondered what the three little sisters of the famous Lilypads get up to in their free time? Find out in this Lilypad Lily spinoff adventure full of headpats, plot twists, and silly hijinks!
